record.field: You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because its state is different from draft.
You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because their customers/suppliers are different.
You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because their invoice addresses are different.
You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because their journals are different.
You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because their payment terms are different.
You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because their bank accounts are different.
You can not merge the invoice "%(invoice)s" because has a number.
You can not merge invoices "%(invoices)s" because their type ara different.
